DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / THE FIRST ROUND ; SPOTLIGHT ; WHAT , BRAZIL WORRIED ?
DOC.TEXT: Brazilian novelist Joao Ubaldo in Rio de Janeiro ' s O Globo : " I never thought I ' d write this , but I ' m a bit afraid of playing against the United States . It ' s obvious that , normally , any Brazilian team not composed exclusively of wooden_leg players would beat the United States . But the way we are playing , under pressure to not lose , I prepare myself for 90 minutes of suffering and exasperation , as with the awful game against Sweden. "
